Description_lang: Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Shield by $s3%$?s137040[ and causes it to generate an additional $s1 Maelstrom when triggered][]$?s137041[ and it has an additional $s2% chance to trigger Maelstrom Weapon when triggered][].Increases the healing done by Earth Shield by $s4%.$?s137039[Increases the amount of mana recovered when Water Shield is triggered by $s5%.][]

description_blz.en_US:
Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Shield by 100%.

Increases the healing done by Earth Shield by 25%.
description_blz.es_MX:
Aumenta un 100% el daño que inflige Escudo de relámpagos.

Aumenta un 25% la sanación realizada por Escudo de tierra.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Aumenta em 100% o dano causado por Escudo de Raios.

Aumenta em 25% a cura realizada por Escudo da Terra.
description_blz.de_DE:
Erhöht den von 'Blitzschlagschild' verursachten Schaden um 100%.

Erhöht die von 'Erdschild' hervorgerufene Heilung um 25%.
description_blz.en_GB:
Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Shield by 100%.

Increases the healing done by Earth Shield by 25%.
description_blz.es_ES:
Aumenta un 100% el daño infligido por Escudo de relámpagos.

Aumenta un 25% la sanación realizada de Escudo de tierra.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Augmente les dégâts infligés par Bouclier de foudre de 100%.

Augmente les soins reçus de Bouclier de terre de 25%.
description_blz.it_IT:
Aumenta i danni inflitti da Scudo di Fulmini del 100%.

Aumenta le cure fornite da Scudo di Terra del 25%.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Увеличивает урон от "Щита молний" на 100%.

Усиливает исцеление от "Щита земли" на 25%.
description_blz.ko_KR:
번개 보호막의 공격력이 100%만큼 증가합니다..

대지의 보호막의 치유량이 25%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
使閃電之盾造成的傷害提高100%。

使大地之盾的治療量提高25%。
description_blz.zh_CN:
闪电之盾造成的伤害提高100%。

大地之盾的治疗效果提高25%。
